mapper.select: SELECT /* [commons.syslsms.xml]["selectSysLsmsTxtList"][SMS/LMS 자주 사용하는 문구 목록 조회][Ed] */ SSET.TXT_SN ,SSET.TXT_CONT /* 내용 */ ,SSET.TXT_CPCTY /* 용량 */ ,(SELECT ADMIN_NM FROM SYS_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = SSET.REGTR_ID) AS REGTR_ID_NM /*등록자명*/ FROM SYS_SMS_EMAIL_TXT SSET WHERE 1 = 1 AND SSET.SMS_EMAIL_SECT_CD = 'SMS' AND SSET.TXT_USE_SECT_CD = 'CSO' ORDER BY SSET.REG_DT DESC
